it.polimi.se2018.model.events

Class DiceSwap

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.model.events.ViewMessage
      • it.polimi.se2018.model.events.DiceSwap

  • public class DiceSwap
extends ViewMessage
    This class is used to encapsulate the data needed for the action of swapping one Die from the DraftPool with a Die of the RoundTrack. This action is allowed by the ToolCard 'Lens Cutter'.
    Author:
    giorgiolabate

    • Constructor Detail

      • DiceSwap

        public DiceSwap(int sourceIndex,
                Coordinates destination,
                View view,
                java.lang.String action,
                java.lang.String playerName)
        Constructor of the class.
        Parameters:
        sourceIndex - The index used to select the Die from the DraftPool.
        destination - The coordinates of the Die in the RoundTrack.
        view - The view reference.
        action - The action that the Player wants to perform.
        playerName - The name of the player that is performing the action.

    • Method Detail

      • getSourceIndex

        public int getSourceIndex()
        Getter for the index of the Die in the DraftPool.
        Returns:
        The index of the chosen Die in the DraftPool.

      • getDestination

        public Coordinates getDestination()
        Getter for the coordinates of the Die in the RoundTrack.
        Returns:
        The coordinates of the position in the RoundTrack at which the Die in the DraftPool must be placed through the swapping.
